name: Sloshy Street
description:
My interactive media piece is about drinking and driving, and the stories that arise from the activity. Most do not end happily, as it is difficult to maintain control of your vehicle while buzzed and later drunk. There are effects added as you collect more alcohol that simulate various effects drinking causes to your driving skills. At the end of each crash, there are stories that reveal drinking while driving and their real consequences on people. To control the car, use WASD, arrow keys, or a controller. Make sure to click on the app in the browser to make sure the game is receiving input properly if the car is not moving.
